thread.title: 19 Bootleg Movie Posters From Ghana That Are BONKERS

author: Anonymous
title: 19 Bootleg Movie Posters From Ghana That Are BONKERS
text:
Tweet Posted: Tue, 2/21/2017 - 5:04am by Will Weldon 
Movie posters aren’t always exactly honest , which sometimes makes it feel like the movie studio is deliberately lying to you. But these bootlegged movie posters from Ghana, created by local artists for road show-style screenings of VHS tapes at people’s houses, are just as all over the place. In fact, some of them actually do a pretty good job of representing its movie. That’s why I'm not only showcasing some of the best posters on the internet, I’ve also given each one a ranking as to how well it conveys the idea of the movie. Mission: Impossible
